name: Oprichniki Hailstorm Cannoneer
desc:
An elite officer of the Fatui Oprichniki who uses a heavy cannon to tear enemy formations apart while using a mighty shield to defend their comrades.
Bitter battles have dyed the shield frost white, while coatings of blood have tinted its edges black. Oprichniki officers know that empty words will never bring back those who have fallen in sacrifice — only a bombardment akin to a hailstorm can shake this defiled Old World.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Tattered Warrant
dropMaterial.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
One wonders what resolve drove its bearer to sign up.

dropMaterial.name: Immaculate Warrant
dropMaterial.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
One wonders if the exquisite styling might hide a price paid for its owner's promotion.

dropMaterial.name: Frost-Etched Warrant
dropMaterial.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
Adorned by a frost-colored crystal — a symbol of glory. One wonders what deeds its bearer must have performed to prove their loyalty and worth.

customize.text: A member of the Fatui's elite Oprichniki forces tasked with maintaining the line of battle. They wield powerful, modified weapons that harness the power of kuuvahki. Because of this, you might be able to effectively target them with kuuvahki-based attacks <color=#ffe14b>while they're charging up their weapons to unleash powerful attacks</color> ...

<color=#ffd780>"Mine Now, Friend!"</color>
...As expected, your own weapon feels most natural.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.
